page.title: 11PLAYGROUND GAMES 2
page.content: {BLUE BELLS}is a skipping game.The children sing'Blue bells,cockle shells,evy,ivy,over.Alright(name),I'll tell your mother,you've been kissing in the parlour with (name).How many kisses did you give her?"The person named jumps the rope,turned by two people.On every skip 5,10,15 etc.is counted.If the jumper is out,that is the number of kisses. {RED ROVER}is a game where you need two teams to play. Each team holds hands. One team calls "Red Rover, Red Rover, we call (Jonny) over."Then Jonny runs and tries to break through the other team.If he succeeds,he returns to his own team.If he doesn't he stays with the opponents team.The game goes on until one team has no one left.
